defaultRideable.name: Tokens rideable by default
defaultRideable.descrp: Wether all tokens should be rideable by default (can be changed for each token in the token settings)

LocknKeyintegration.name: Lock & Key integration
LocknKeyintegration.descrp: Allows rideable tokens to be locked

RidingHeight.name: Riding height
RidingHeight.descrp: The z-height which a riding token has compared to its mount (recommended to be above 0)

useRiddenTokenHeight.name: Use token height
useRiddenTokenHeight.descrp: Uses a the riddens token height (added through the "Wall-Height" module) instead of the set "Riding height"

MountingDistance.name: Mounting distance
MountingDistance.descrp: The maximum distance a token can have to its mounting target (-1 for an unlimited range)

UseArmReachDistance.name: Use "Arms Reach" distance
UseArmReachDistance.descrp: Uses the distance set in the "Arms Reach" for the mounting distance

BorderDistance.name: Border to border distance
BorderDistance.descrp: If the mounting distance should be calculated from the tokens border instead of the middle point (only works correctly for circular/square tokens)

MaxRiders.name: Maximum riders per token
MaxRiders.descrp: The maximum amount of tokens, a token can be ridden by (-1 for unlimited)

RiderMovement.name: Rider movement
RiderMovement.descrp: What should happen if a riding token tries to move on its own

RiderRotation.name: Link rotations
RiderRotation.descrp: Rotates alls riders if a ridden token is rotated (also works with "Move ridden Token" option)

RidingSystemEffects.name: Apply "Mounted" effect
RidingSystemEffects.descrp: If a token starts riding, a system dependent effect will be applied to the token (only works if the game system has a known "Mounted" effect. Compatible systems: Pf2e)

RideableTag.name: "Rideable" trait
RideableTag.descrp: Allows tokens which have the 'Rideable' trait to be ridden (the "Rideable" trait has to be manually added under settings>Pathfinder 2nd Edition>Manage Honebrew Elements>Creature Traits)

FamiliarRiding.name: Familiar riding
FamiliarRiding.descrp: Allows for familiars to ride their master, the familairs will be placed at the corners of their master

Grappling.name: Grappling
Grappling.descrp: Allows tokens to grapple one another (grappled tokens can only be unmounted by the grappling token)

PreventEnemyRiding.name: Prevent enemy riding
PreventEnemyRiding.descrp: Stops tokens from riding enemy tokens (GMs can still override this)

FitRidersize.name: Adjust rider size
FitRidersize.descrp: Adjusts the size of the rider in the case that it is greater or equal to the size of the ridden token

MessagePopUps.name: Message popups
MessagePopUps.descrp: Enables multible popups upon actions such as mounting or dismounting

OnlyownedMessagePopUps.name: Own message popups only
OnlyownedMessagePopUps.descrp: Only shows the message popups from tokens you control

Mount.name: Mount
Mount.descrp: Mount controlled Tokens to targeted Token (alternative Macro: "Mount")

UnMount.name: Unmount
UnMount.descrp: Unmount controlled Tokens from their ridden Token, or unmount targeted Token from controlled Token (alternative Macro: "Unmount")

MountFamiliar.name: Mount familiar
MountFamiliar.descrp: Mount controlled familiars to targeted Token if targeted Token is master(alternative Macro: "MountFamiliar") (only if setting "Familiar riding" is activated)

GrappleTarget.name: Grapple/release target
GrappleTarget.descrp: Mount targeted token to controlled Token, can only be unmounted by grappling token(alternative Macro: "Grapple") (only if setting "Grappling" is activated)

MaxRiderFlag.name: Maximum riders
MaxRiderFlag.descrp: Overrides the global setting for this token (-1 for unlimited, leave empty to return to default world setting)

RiderPositioningFlag.name: Rider positioning
RiderPositioningFlag.descrp: The pattern in which the rider tokens will be placed

InsideMovementFlag.name: Riders can move freely
InsideMovementFlag.descrp: If riders can move freely within the boundaries of this token

SpawnRidersFlag.name: Spawn riders
SpawnRidersFlag.descrp: Riders this token spawns with (Names or IDs, seperated with ";")
